title: Walnut Canyon National Monument: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     May 10, 2016  Walnut Canyon National Monument Will Be Closed Monday, May 23, 2016 Due to a Scheduled Power Outage  Walnut Canyon National Monument will be closed Monday, May 23, 2016 due to a scheduled power outage by APS. Access to the monument including the visitor center, trails, picnic area and parking lot will be closed during this time. The monument will reopen at 9:00 am on Tuesday, May 24, 2016.   May 04, 2016  Flagstaff Area National Monuments Awarded International Dark Sky Park Designation  The National Park Service (NPS) and International Dark-Sky Association (IDA) are pleased to announce Flagstaff Area National Monuments—Sunset Crater Volcano, Walnut Canyon and Wupatki—have been designated as an International Dark Sky Park by the IDA.   April 22, 2016  Flagstaff Area National Monuments Create $36 Million in Benefits  Report shows visitor spending supports jobs in local economy.   August 21, 2014  Flagstaff Area National Monuments Superintendent Releases Updated Compendium  Superintendent Releases Updated Compendium for Flagstaff Area National Monuments
